comments:
* Turn off pref to remove terminated launches
* Launch one program
* Pin the console
* Launch another
* Remove all terminated
* Launch again

> The page book view assumes the page removed is always the "activeRec". In 
this case we remove a page that is not the active rec and the active Rec 
remains as a disposed page.

Fixed in ConsoleView. The fix was to always show the default page when asked, 
as this is called as part of the process of removing a page. If we don't show 
the page, then the activeRec is not updated properly.

Changed the fix to modify the PIN flag on removal, otherwise the default page 
can be displayed in other consoles that are pinned :-) (This is crazy)

Fixed. The fix is to do as we were (always display the default page when 
asked), and also alow a page to be displayed when the active console is null 
and the view is pinned :-)
